references.paper_title: Skilful precipitation nowcasting using deep generative models of radar
references.reason: This paper is cited as a pioneering work in using deep generative models for precipitation nowcasting, providing a strong foundation for this research area.

references.paper_title: Convolutional LSTM Network: A machine learning approach for precipitation nowcasting
references.reason: This work introduced the convolutional LSTM network, a foundational model for spatiotemporal forecasting which is widely used in precipitation nowcasting research.

references.paper_title: PredRNN: Recurrent neural networks for predictive learning using spatiotemporal LSTMs
references.reason: This paper introduced PredRNN, a significant advancement in recurrent neural networks for spatiotemporal forecasting which improves upon previous models by incorporating spatiotemporal LSTMs.

references.paper_title: Earthformer: Exploring space-time transformers for earth system forecasting
references.reason: This paper leverages the power of transformers in earth system forecasting, which shows great potential and greatly influences the recent works.

references.paper_title: Rainformer: Features extraction balanced network for radar-based precipitation nowcasting
references.reason: This work introduces Rainformer, another transformer-based model specifically designed for precipitation nowcasting which provides advanced features extraction.
